title: Rust 1.73.0 breaks build

labels.name: low-hanging-fruit
labels.description: Easy to resolve, get it before someone else does!

body:
## Description

The current build under the Beta Rust compiler is broken.

## Version

```
$ git rev-parse HEAD
c25825a5393aca2cde6e33dd673f8c074c2b543b
$ rustc -V
rustc 1.72.0-beta.1 (7ba605cd9 2023-07-11)
```

## Present Behaviour

```
$ rustup override set beta
$ make
warning: private item shadows public glob re-export
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:41:65
   |
41 | use types::{AbstractExecPayload, BeaconStateError, ExecPayload, Withdrawals};
   |                                                                 ^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
note: the name `Withdrawals` in the type namespace is supposed to be publicly re-exported here
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:12:9
   |
12 | pub use engine_api::*;
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: but the private item here shadows it
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:41:65
   |
41 | use types::{AbstractExecPayload, BeaconStateError, ExecPayload, Withdrawals};
   |                                                                 ^^^^^^^^^^^
   = note: `#[warn(hidden_glob_reexports)]` on by default

warning: private item shadows public glob re-export
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:43:50
   |
43 |     BlindedPayload, BlockType, ChainSpec, Epoch, ExecutionBlockHash, ExecutionPayload,
   |                                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
note: the name `ExecutionBlockHash` in the type namespace is supposed to be publicly re-exported here
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:12:9
   |
12 | pub use engine_api::*;
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: but the private item here shadows it
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:43:50
   |
43 |     BlindedPayload, BlockType, ChainSpec, Epoch, ExecutionBlockHash, ExecutionPayload,
   |                                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

warning: private item shadows public glob re-export
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:43:70
   |
43 |     BlindedPayload, BlockType, ChainSpec, Epoch, ExecutionBlockHash, ExecutionPayload,
   |                                                                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
note: the name `ExecutionPayload` in the type namespace is supposed to be publicly re-exported here
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:12:9
   |
12 | pub use engine_api::*;
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: but the private item here shadows it
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:43:70
   |
43 |     BlindedPayload, BlockType, ChainSpec, Epoch, ExecutionBlockHash, ExecutionPayload,
   |                                                                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

warning: private item shadows public glob re-export
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:44:53
   |
44 |     ExecutionPayloadCapella, ExecutionPayloadMerge, ForkName, ForkVersionedResponse,
   |                                                     ^^^^^^^^
   |
note: the name `ForkName` in the type namespace is supposed to be publicly re-exported here
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:12:9
   |
12 | pub use engine_api::*;
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: but the private item here shadows it
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:44:53
   |
44 |     ExecutionPayloadCapella, ExecutionPayloadMerge, ForkName, ForkVersionedResponse,
   |                                                     ^^^^^^^^

warning: private item shadows public glob re-export
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:45:82
   |
45 |     ProposerPreparationData, PublicKeyBytes, Signature, SignedBeaconBlock, Slot, Uint256,
   |                                                                                  ^^^^^^^
   |
note: the name `Uint256` in the type namespace is supposed to be publicly re-exported here
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:12:9
   |
12 | pub use engine_api::*;
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: but the private item here shadows it
  --> beacon_node/execution_layer/src/lib.rs:45:82
   |
45 |     ProposerPreparationData, PublicKeyBytes, Signature, SignedBeaconBlock, Slot, Uint256,
   |     
```

## Expected Behaviour

The build should succeed.

## Steps to resolve

Fix compile errors (TBA).
